      • getDiscoverable

        public java.lang.Boolean getDiscoverable()
        Gets the discoverable flag. Discoverable indicates if automatic discovery should be performed against this host.
        Returns:
        true if automatic discovery is enabled, false if automatic discovery is disabled.
